name: Black & White - Disoriented
description:
Welcome to a world which has just two colors. This is retro-maze game where you will have to pass through 6 levels, each with new elemment comparing to the first one. For example third level has teleports and barriers, but level 4 has blinking platforms that will kill you when you step to them. This game has two color modes, Normal and Inverted. After you win all 6 levels, you can turn on wireframe mode like in final two pictures.

- Retro Gameplay

- 6 Levels

- Two Color Modes

- 3 Dangers

- Disorienting Map Design
